mapper.select: select w.id AS "id", w.longitude AS "longitude", w.latitude AS "latitude", w.phone_type AS "phoneType", w.pic_name AS "picName", w.predict_value AS "predictValue", w.district_code AS "districtCode", w.city_code AS "cityCode", w.image_value AS "imageValue", w.weather_value AS "weatherValue", left(TRIM(w.create_date),10) AS "createDate" from t_result_data w order by w.id desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
